wanigasinha mahatha pawasiya.me anuwa ambaa, rambautan, dodam, delum , anoda, alipera , beli, duriyan, pera lowi , jamanaran , sapathilla, kamaranga, ugurassa,  diwul, ambaaralla, nelli, papol, pashanfrut , jambu, jambola , gaduguda, waraka kathurumurunga, dehi , karapincha pala warga weyi.me anuwa kagalla pradeshiya lekam kottasaye pala 4023kda, aranayakata pala 3708kda , daraniyagalata pala 2596kda rambaukkanata tha2la 1273kda, galgamaduwata pala 4819kda, mawanallata pala 8372kda, yatiyanthota pala 2248kda, dehioowita pradeshiya lekam kottasayata 9603kda, ruwanwallata 1406kda, warakapolata 2676kda, bulathkohupitiya pradeshiya lekam kottasayata pala 9525kda beda dimata niyamithaya.pasugiya kalaye thula palathuru pala delaksha wisihaya dahas harasiya hatak pamana beda di athi bawa disapathiwaraya pawasiya..
